titleStmt.title: J. Newt Turner to Beriah Magoffin
CWG2424

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
Princeton Ky
Feby 4/61.
Govr Magoffin
Sir

It becomes my duty to advise your Excellency of a vacancy in the Office of Justice of the Peace in the 1st District of of Caldwell County ^occasioned^ by the resignation of Esqr M. Dudley and would respectfully Suggest the name of our Townsman James B. Sasseen as a proper and Suitable to whom if tendered would accept the appointment,

Very Respectfully
Your Obt svt,
J. Newt Turner

J. P.
J. B. Sasseen
Dist No 1
Issd Feby 13 1861
